document_data.mainbody:
Illumor Sendever was a Chondathan human man living in the city of Wheloon in Cormyr. He owned and worked at Sendevers Stables. In this capacity, he bought and sold horses, provided veterinary care to them, and rented out stables  for them.
Sendever ran his stables by 1358 DR, and was still in business through 1369 DR and in 1374 DR. He was an aging man in 1374 DR.
